mapper.insert: insert into board(member_id as memberId, title, content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt) values ( #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id as boardId, m.id, m.name, b.title, b.created_at as createdAt, b.updated_at as updatedAt FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON m.member_id = b.member_id
